00096 void SceneModel::SetCoinScene( TSceneKit& coinScene )
00097 {
00098         if( m_instanceRoot )    Clear();
00099         m_mapCoinQt.clear();
00100         m_coinScene = 0;
00101     m_coinScene = &coinScene;
00102 
00103     SetRoot();
00104     SetLight();
00105     SetConcentrator();
00106     reset();
00107 }

00114 void SceneModel::Clear()
00115 {
00116         DeleteInstanceTree( *m_instanceRoot );
00117 
00118         delete m_instanceRoot;
00119         m_instanceRoot = 0;
00120 
00121 }

00128 void SceneModel::SetRoot()
00129 {
00130     m_instanceRoot = new InstanceNode( m_coinScene );
00131     QList< InstanceNode* > instanceRootNodeList;
00132     m_mapCoinQt.insert( std::make_pair( m_coinScene, instanceRootNodeList ) );
00133     m_mapCoinQt[m_coinScene].append( m_instanceRoot );
00134 }
00135 
00136 void SceneModel::SetLight()
00137 {
00138     if ( m_coinScene->getPart("lightList[0]", false ) )
00139     {
00140         TLightKit* tlightKit = static_cast< TLightKit* >( m_coinScene->getPart("lightList[0]", false ) );
00141         InsertLightNode( *tlightKit );
00142     }
00143 }
00144 
00145 void SceneModel::SetConcentrator()
00146 {
00147         SoNodeKitListPart* coinPartList = static_cast< SoNodeKitListPart* >( m_coinScene->getPart( "childList", true ) );
00148 
00149         //TSeparatorKit* separatorKit;
00150         if ( coinPartList && coinPartList->getNumChildren() == 0 )
00151         {
00152                 //Create Sun coordinate system node
00153                 TSeparatorKit* sunSeparatorKit = new TSeparatorKit();
00154                 sunSeparatorKit->setName( "SunNode" );
00155                 coinPartList->addChild( sunSeparatorKit );
00156                 sunSeparatorKit->setSearchingChildren( true );
00157                 InstanceNode* instanceNode = AddInstanceNode( *m_instanceRoot, sunSeparatorKit );
00158                 SoNodeKitListPart* sunSeparatorChildList = static_cast< SoNodeKitListPart* >( sunSeparatorKit->getPart( "childList", true ) );
00159 
00160                 TSceneTracker* sceneTracker = new TSceneTracker;
00161                 sunSeparatorKit->setPart( "tracker", sceneTracker );
00162                 sceneTracker->SetSceneKit( m_coinScene );
00163 
00164 
00165                 //Create Concentrator coordinate system node
00166                 TSeparatorKit* separatorKit = new TSeparatorKit();
00167                 separatorKit->setName( "RootNode" );
00168                 sunSeparatorChildList->addChild( separatorKit );
00169                 separatorKit->setSearchingChildren( true );
00170 
00171                 m_instanceConcentrator = AddInstanceNode( *instanceNode, separatorKit );
00172         }
00173         else
00174         {
00175                 TSeparatorKit* sunSeparatorKit = static_cast< TSeparatorKit* >( coinPartList->getChild( 0 ) );
00176                 if ( !sunSeparatorKit ) return;
00177 
00178                 InstanceNode* sunInstanceNode = AddInstanceNode( *m_instanceRoot, sunSeparatorKit );
00179                 SoNodeKitListPart* sunSeparatorChildList = static_cast< SoNodeKitListPart* >( sunSeparatorKit->getPart( "childList", true ) );
00180                 if ( !sunSeparatorChildList ) return;
00181 
00182                 SoNode* tracker = sunSeparatorKit->getPart( "tracker", false );
00183                 if( tracker )
00184                 {
00185                         TTracker* trackerNode = static_cast< TTracker* >( tracker );
00186                         trackerNode->SetSceneKit( m_coinScene );
00187                         //AddInstanceNode( instanceNodeParent, tracker );
00188                 }
00189 
00190 
00191                 TSeparatorKit* separatorKit = static_cast< TSeparatorKit* >( sunSeparatorChildList->getChild( 0 ) );
00192                 if( !separatorKit )     return;
00193 
00194                 m_instanceConcentrator = AddInstanceNode( *sunInstanceNode, separatorKit );
00195                 GenerateInstanceTree( *m_instanceConcentrator );
00196         }
00197 }

00199 InstanceNode* SceneModel::AddInstanceNode( InstanceNode& instanceNodeParent, SoNode* soNode )
00200 {
00201         InstanceNode* instanceNode = new InstanceNode( soNode );
00202         if( instanceNode )
00203         {
00204                 instanceNodeParent.AddChild( instanceNode );
00205                 QList< InstanceNode* > instanceNodeList;
00206                 m_mapCoinQt.insert( std::make_pair( soNode, instanceNodeList ) );
00207                 m_mapCoinQt[soNode].append( instanceNode );
00208         }
00209         return instanceNode;
00210 }
00211 
00212 void SceneModel::GenerateInstanceTree( InstanceNode& instanceNodeParent )
00213 {
00214         SoNode* parentNode = instanceNodeParent.GetNode();
00215 
00216         if( parentNode )
00217         {
00218                 if( parentNode->getTypeId().isDerivedFrom( SoBaseKit::getClassTypeId() ) )
00219                 {
00220                         if( parentNode->getTypeId().isDerivedFrom( TShapeKit::getClassTypeId() ) )
00221                         {
00222                                 GenerateTShapeKitSubTree( instanceNodeParent, parentNode  );
00223                         }
00224                         /*else if( parentNode->getTypeId().isDerivedFrom( TAnalyzerKit::getClassTypeId() ) )
00225                         {
00226                         }*/
00227                         else
00228                         {
00229                                 GenerateTSeparatorKitSubTree( instanceNodeParent, parentNode  );
00230                         }
00231                 }
00232         }
00233 }
00234 
00235 void SceneModel::GenerateTShapeKitSubTree( InstanceNode& instanceNodeParent, SoNode* parentNode )
00236 {
00237         TShapeKit* parentKit = static_cast< TShapeKit* >( parentNode );
00238         if( parentKit )
00239         {
00240                 SoNode* shape = parentKit->getPart("shape", false);
00241                 if( shape )     AddInstanceNode( instanceNodeParent, shape );
00242                 SoNode* material = parentKit->getPart("appearance.material", false);
00243                 if( material ) AddInstanceNode( instanceNodeParent, material );
00244         }
00245 }
00246 
00247 void SceneModel::GenerateTSeparatorKitSubTree( InstanceNode& instanceNodeParent, SoNode* parentNode )
00248 {
00249         //Is TSeparatorKit node
00250         SoBaseKit* parentKit = static_cast< SoBaseKit* >( parentNode );
00251         if( parentKit )
00252         {
00253                 SoNode* tracker = parentKit->getPart( "tracker", false );
00254                 if( tracker )
00255                 {
00256                         TTracker* trackerNode = static_cast< TTracker* >( tracker );
00257                         trackerNode->SetSceneKit( m_coinScene );
00258                         AddInstanceNode( instanceNodeParent, tracker );
00259                 }
00260 
00261                 SoNodeKitListPart* coinPartList = static_cast< SoNodeKitListPart* >( parentKit->getPart( "childList", false ) );
00262                 if ( coinPartList )
00263                 {
00264                         for( int index = 0; index < coinPartList->getNumChildren(); ++index )
00265                         {
00266                                 SoBaseKit* coinChild = static_cast< SoBaseKit* >( coinPartList->getChild( index ) );
00267                                 InstanceNode* instanceChild = AddInstanceNode( instanceNodeParent, coinChild );
00268                                 if( instanceChild) GenerateInstanceTree( *instanceChild );
00269                         }
00270                 }
00271         }
00272 }

00274 QModelIndex SceneModel::index( int row, int column, const QModelIndex& parentModelIndex ) const
00275 {
00276         if ( !m_instanceRoot ) return QModelIndex();
00277         InstanceNode* instanceParent = NodeFromIndex( parentModelIndex );
00278     return createIndex( row, column, instanceParent->children[ row ] );
00279 }

00281 InstanceNode* SceneModel::NodeFromIndex( const QModelIndex& modelIndex ) const
00282 {
00283         if ( modelIndex.isValid() ) return static_cast< InstanceNode* >( modelIndex.internalPointer() );
00284     else return m_instanceRoot;
00285 }

00287 int SceneModel::rowCount( const QModelIndex& parentModelIndex ) const
00288 {
00289         InstanceNode* instanceParent = NodeFromIndex( parentModelIndex );
00290         if( instanceParent->GetNode()->getTypeId().isDerivedFrom( TAnalyzerKit::getClassTypeId() ) ) return 0; //used to mask AnalyzerTree in tree node
00291     return ( instanceParent ) ? ( instanceParent->children.count() ) : 0;
00292 }
00293 
00294 int SceneModel::columnCount( const QModelIndex& ) const
00295 {
00296         return 1;
00297 }

00299 QModelIndex SceneModel::parent( const QModelIndex& childModelIndex ) const
00300 {
00301         InstanceNode* instanceChild = NodeFromIndex( childModelIndex );
00302     if ( !instanceChild ) return QModelIndex();
00303 
00304     InstanceNode* instanceParent = instanceChild->GetParent();
00305     if ( !instanceParent ) return QModelIndex();
00306 
00307     InstanceNode* instanceGrandparent = instanceParent->GetParent();
00308     if ( !instanceGrandparent ) return QModelIndex();
00309 
00310     int row = instanceGrandparent->children.indexOf( instanceParent );
00311     return createIndex( row, childModelIndex.column(), instanceParent );
00312 }

00314 QVariant SceneModel::headerData( int section, Qt::Orientation orientation, int role ) const
00315 {
00316         if ( orientation == Qt::Horizontal && role == Qt::DisplayRole)
00317         {
00318                 if ( section == 0 ) return tr( "Node" );
00319     }
00320     return QVariant();
00321 }
00322 
00323 QVariant SceneModel::data( const QModelIndex& modelIndex, int role ) const
00324 {
00325 
00326     if ( role != Qt::DisplayRole && role != Qt::UserRole && role != Qt::DecorationRole ) return QVariant();
00327 
00328     InstanceNode* instanceNode = NodeFromIndex( modelIndex );
00329     if ( !instanceNode ) return QVariant();
00330 
00331 
00332     if ( modelIndex.column() == 0 )
00333     {
00334         SoNode* coinNode = instanceNode->GetNode();
00335         if ( !coinNode ) return QVariant();
00336 
00337         if ( role == Qt::DisplayRole )
00338         {
00339             if ( coinNode )
00340             {
00341                 QString nodeName;
00342                 if ( coinNode->getName() == SbName() )
00343                         nodeName = QString( coinNode->getTypeId().getName().getString() );
00344                 else
00345                         nodeName = QString( coinNode->getName().getString() );
00346 
00347 
00348                                 SoSearchAction* coinSearch = new SoSearchAction();
00349                                 coinSearch->setNode( coinNode );
00350                                 coinSearch->setInterest( SoSearchAction::ALL);
00351                                 coinSearch->apply( m_coinRoot );
00352 
00353                                 int numReferences = coinSearch->getPaths( ).getLength();
00354 
00355                                 QString references ( " ( " );
00356                                 references += QString::number( numReferences, 10);
00357                                 references += " )  " ;
00358 
00359                                 delete coinSearch;
00360 
00361                 return references + nodeName;
00362             }
00363             else return QVariant();
00364         }
00365 
00366         if ( role == Qt::UserRole )
00367         {
00368                 SoNodeKitPath* coinKitPath = PathFromIndex(modelIndex);
00369                 if ( coinKitPath )
00370                 {
00371                         PathWrapper pathWrapper( coinKitPath );
00372                     return QVariant::fromValue( pathWrapper );
00373 
00374                 }
00375                 coinKitPath->unref();
00376                 return  QVariant();
00377         }
00378         if (role == Qt::DecorationRole)
00379         {
00380                         if( coinNode->getTypeId().isDerivedFrom( TLightKit::getClassTypeId() ) )
00381                         {
00382                                 return QIcon(":/icons/lightKit.png");
00383                         }
00384                         else if( coinNode->getTypeId().isDerivedFrom(TAnalyzerKit::getClassTypeId() ) )
00385                         {
00386                                 TAnalyzerKit* analyzerKit = static_cast<TAnalyzerKit*>( coinNode );
00387                                 return QIcon( analyzerKit->getIcon() );
00388 
00389                         }
00390                         else if( coinNode->getTypeId().isDerivedFrom(TSeparatorKit::getClassTypeId() ) )
00391                         {
00392                                 TSeparatorKit* separatorKit = static_cast<TSeparatorKit*>( coinNode );
00393                                 return QIcon( separatorKit->getIcon() );
00394 
00395                         }
00396                         else if( coinNode->getTypeId().isDerivedFrom(TShapeKit::getClassTypeId() ) )
00397                         {
00398                                 SoBaseKit* nodeKit = static_cast< SoBaseKit* >( coinNode );
00399                                 TShape* kit = static_cast<TShape*>( nodeKit->getPart( "shape", false ) );
00400                                 if( kit ) return QIcon( kit->GetIcon() );
00401                                 return QIcon( ":/icons/shapeKit.png" );
00402                         }
00403                         else if( coinNode->getTypeId().isDerivedFrom(SoShape::getClassTypeId() ) )
00404                         {
00405                                 TShape* shape = static_cast<TShape*>( coinNode );
00406                                 return QIcon( shape->GetIcon() );
00407                         }
00408                         else if( coinNode->getTypeId().isDerivedFrom(TMaterial::getClassTypeId() ) )
00409                         {
00410                                 TMaterial* material = static_cast<TMaterial*>( coinNode );
00411                                 return QIcon(material->getIcon());
00412                         }
00413                         else if( coinNode->getTypeId().isDerivedFrom(TTracker::getClassTypeId() ) )
00414                         {
00415                                 TTracker* tracer = static_cast<TTracker*>( coinNode );
00416                                 return QIcon(tracer->getIcon());
00417                         }
00418         }
00419     }
00420     return QVariant();
00421 }
00422 
00423 int SceneModel::InsertCoinNode( SoNode& coinChild, SoBaseKit& coinParent )
00424 {
00425         int row = -1;
00426         if (coinParent.getTypeId().isDerivedFrom( TSeparatorKit::getClassTypeId() ) )
00427         {
00428                 if( coinChild.getTypeId().isDerivedFrom( TTracker::getClassTypeId() ) )
00429                 {
00430                         coinParent.setPart( "tracker", &coinChild );
00431                         row = 0;
00432                 }
00433                 else
00434                 {
00435 
00436                         SoNodeKitListPart* coinPartList = static_cast< SoNodeKitListPart* >( coinParent.getPart( "childList", true ) );
00437                         if ( !coinPartList ) return -1;
00438 
00439                         row = coinPartList->getNumChildren();
00440 
00441                         if( coinChild.getTypeId().isDerivedFrom( SoBaseKit::getClassTypeId() ) )
00442                         {
00443                                 SoBaseKit* childKit = static_cast< SoBaseKit* >( &coinChild );
00444                                 coinPartList->addChild( childKit );
00445                                 childKit->setSearchingChildren( true );
00446 
00447                                 if( coinParent.getPart( "tracker", false ) ) row++;
00448                         }
00449                 }
00450 
00451         }
00452     else
00453     {
00454         TShapeKit* shapeKit = static_cast< TShapeKit* > ( &coinParent );
00455         if( shapeKit->getPart( "shape", false ) ) row++;
00456         if( shapeKit->getPart( "appearance.material", false ) ) row++;
00457     }
00458 
00459         QList<InstanceNode*>& instanceListParent = m_mapCoinQt[ &coinParent ];
00460         for ( int index = 0; index < instanceListParent.count(); index++ )
00461         {
00462             InstanceNode* instanceParent = instanceListParent[index];
00463                 InstanceNode* instanceChild = new InstanceNode( &coinChild );
00464                 instanceParent->InsertChild( row, instanceChild );
00465 
00466                 //Inserting InstanceNode in the map
00467                 QList< InstanceNode* > instanceNodeList;
00468                 m_mapCoinQt.insert( std::make_pair( &coinChild, instanceNodeList ) );
00469         m_mapCoinQt[ &coinChild ].append( instanceChild );
00470 
00471         GenerateInstanceTree( *instanceChild );
00472         }
00473         emit layoutChanged();
00474 
00475         return row;
00476 }
00477 
00482 void SceneModel::InsertLightNode( TLightKit& coinLight )
00483 {
00484         SoNodeKitListPart* lightList = static_cast< SoNodeKitListPart* > ( m_coinScene->getPart("lightList", true ) ) ;
00485         if ( lightList->getNumChildren() > 0 )
00486                 if( m_instanceRoot->children.size() > 0 ) m_instanceRoot->children.remove( 0 );
00487 
00488         m_coinScene->setPart( "lightList[0]", &coinLight );
00489 
00490         SoSearchAction* tracersSearch = new SoSearchAction();
00491         tracersSearch->setType( TTracker::getClassTypeId() );
00492         tracersSearch->setInterest( SoSearchAction::ALL);
00493         tracersSearch->apply( m_coinRoot );
00494         SoPathList& trackersPath = tracersSearch->getPaths();
00495 
00496         for( int index = 0; index <trackersPath.getLength(); ++index )
00497         {
00498                 SoFullPath* trackerPath = static_cast< SoFullPath* > ( trackersPath[index] );
00499                 TTracker* tracker = static_cast< TTracker* >( trackerPath->getTail() );
00500                 tracker->SetAzimuthAngle( &coinLight.azimuth );
00501                 tracker->SetZenithAngle( &coinLight.zenith );
00502         }
00503 
00504         InstanceNode* instanceLight = new InstanceNode( &coinLight );
00505         m_instanceRoot->InsertChild( 0, instanceLight );
00506 
00507 
00508         emit LightNodeStateChanged( 1 );
00509         emit layoutChanged();
00510 }
00511 
00512 
00513 void SceneModel::RemoveCoinNode( int row, SoBaseKit& coinParent )
00514 {
00515         if (coinParent.getTypeId().isDerivedFrom( TSeparatorKit::getClassTypeId() ) )
00516         {
00517                 if( ( row == 0 ) && coinParent.getPart( "tracker", false ) )
00518                 {
00519                         coinParent.setPart( "tracker", NULL );
00520                 }
00521                 else
00522                 {
00523                         SoNodeKitListPart* coinPartList = static_cast< SoNodeKitListPart* >( coinParent.getPart( "childList", false ) );
00524                         if ( coinPartList )
00525                         {
00526                                 if( coinParent.getPart( "tracker", false ) )    coinPartList->removeChild( row - 1 );
00527                                 else coinPartList->removeChild( row );
00528                         }
00529 
00530                 }
00531 
00532         }
00533 
00534     QList<InstanceNode*> instanceListParent = m_mapCoinQt[ &coinParent ];
00535 
00536         for( int index = 0; index< instanceListParent.size(); ++index )
00537         {
00538             InstanceNode* instanceParent = instanceListParent[index];
00539             InstanceNode* instanceNode = instanceParent->children[row];
00540             instanceParent->children.remove(row);
00541 
00542             QList<InstanceNode*>& instanceList = m_mapCoinQt[ instanceNode->GetNode()];
00543                 instanceList.removeAt( instanceList.indexOf( instanceNode ) );
00544         }
00545         emit layoutChanged();
00546 }

00570 void SceneModel::RemoveLightNode( TLightKit& coinLight )
00571 {
00572         SoNodeKitListPart* lightList = static_cast< SoNodeKitListPart* >( m_coinScene->getPart( "lightList", true ) );
00573     if ( lightList ) lightList->removeChild( &coinLight );
00574     m_instanceRoot->children.remove( 0 );
00575 
00576         SoSearchAction* tracersSearch = new SoSearchAction();
00577         tracersSearch->setType( TTracker::getClassTypeId() );
00578         tracersSearch->setInterest( SoSearchAction::ALL);
00579         tracersSearch->apply( m_coinRoot );
00580         SoPathList& trackersPath = tracersSearch->getPaths();
00581 
00582         for( int index = 0; index <trackersPath.getLength(); ++index )
00583         {
00584                 SoFullPath* trackerPath = static_cast< SoFullPath* > ( trackersPath[index] );
00585                 TTracker* tracker = dynamic_cast< TTracker* >( trackerPath->getTail() );
00586                 tracker->Disconnect();
00587         }
00588 
00589         emit LightNodeStateChanged( 0 );
00590     emit layoutChanged();
00591 
00592 }

00597         m_instanceRoot->ReconnectAllTrackers(coinLight);

00605 Qt::ItemFlags SceneModel::flags( const QModelIndex& modelIndex ) const
00606 {
00607         Qt::ItemFlags defaultFlags = QAbstractItemModel::flags( modelIndex );
00608 
00609         if ( modelIndex.isValid() )
00610         {
00611                 if ( modelIndex.column() > 0 ) return defaultFlags;
00612                 else return Qt::ItemIsDragEnabled | Qt::ItemIsDropEnabled | Qt::ItemIsEditable | defaultFlags;
00613         }
00614         else return defaultFlags;
00615 }
00616 
00617 Qt::DropActions SceneModel::supportedDropActions() const
00618 {
00619         return  Qt::CopyAction | Qt::MoveAction;
00620 }
00621 
00622 Qt::DropActions SceneModel::supportedDragActions() const
00623 {
00624         return Qt::CopyAction | Qt::MoveAction;
00625 }
00631 bool SceneModel::Cut( SoBaseKit& coinParent, int row )
00632 {
00633         if( row < 0 ) return false;
00634 
00635         QList<InstanceNode*> instanceListParent = m_mapCoinQt[ &coinParent ];
00636         InstanceNode* instanceParent = instanceListParent[0];
00637 
00638         SoNode* coinChild = instanceParent->children[row]->GetNode();
00639         if( !coinChild->getTypeId().isDerivedFrom( SoBaseKit::getClassTypeId() ) )
00640         {
00641                 SbString partName = coinParent.getPartString( coinChild );
00642                 if( partName.getLength() == 0 ) partName = "material";
00643 
00644                 coinParent.setPart( partName, NULL );
00645         }
00646         else
00647         {
00648                 if( coinParent.getTypeId().isDerivedFrom( TSeparatorKit::getClassTypeId() ) )
00649                 {
00650 
00651                         SoNodeKitListPart* coinPartList = static_cast< SoNodeKitListPart* >( coinParent.getPart( "childList", false ) );
00652                         if( !coinPartList ) return false;
00653 
00654 
00655                         if( coinParent.getPart( "tracker", false ) )
00656                         {
00657                                 coinChild = coinPartList->getChild( row-1 );
00658                             coinPartList->removeChild( row -1 );
00659                         }
00660                         else
00661                         {
00662                                 coinChild = coinPartList->getChild( row );
00663                             coinPartList->removeChild( row );
00664                         }
00665 
00666                         if( !coinChild ) tgf::SevereError( "SceneModel::Cut Null coinChild pointer" );
00667 
00668                 }
00669         }
00670 
00671         QList<InstanceNode*> instanceList = m_mapCoinQt[ coinChild ];
00672 
00673         // Test if the node is shared
00674         if( instanceList.size() == 1 )
00675         {
00676                 InstanceNode* instanceNode = instanceList[0];
00677             DeleteInstanceTree( *instanceNode );
00678         }
00679         else
00680         {
00681                 QList<InstanceNode*> instanceListParent = m_mapCoinQt[ &coinParent ];
00682                 if( instanceListParent.size() == 1 )
00683                 {
00684                     InstanceNode* instanceParent = instanceListParent[0];
00685                     InstanceNode* instanceNode = instanceParent->children[row];
00686                     DeleteInstanceTree( *instanceNode );
00687                 }
00688                 else
00689                 {
00690                         for( int index = 0; index< instanceListParent.size(); ++index )
00691                         {
00692                             InstanceNode* instanceParent = instanceListParent[index];
00693                             InstanceNode* instanceNode = instanceParent->children[row];
00694                             DeleteInstanceTree( *instanceNode );
00695                         }
00696                 }
00697         }
00698 
00699         emit layoutChanged();
00700 
00701         return true;
00702 }
00703 
00704 
00713 QModelIndex SceneModel::IndexFromNodeUrl( QString nodeUrl ) const
00714 {
00715         QStringList nodeList = nodeUrl.split( "/", QString::SkipEmptyParts );
00716 
00717         if( ( nodeList.size() == 1 ) && ( nodeList[0] == "Light" ) )    return index( 0, 0 );
00718 
00719         if( nodeList.size() > 0 )
00720         {
00721                 QString nodeName = nodeList.last();
00722                 nodeList.removeLast();
00723                 /*if(nodeName=="TrackerHeliostat" || nodeName=="TrackerLinearFresnel" || nodeName=="TrackerOneAxis"){
00724                         nodeName="";
00725                 }*/
00726 
00727                 QString parentNodeURL = QString( "//" ) + nodeList.join( "/" );
00728                 QModelIndex parentIndex = IndexFromNodeUrl( parentNodeURL );
00729                 InstanceNode* parentNode = NodeFromIndex( parentIndex );
00730 
00731                 int child = 0;
00732                 int row = -1;
00733                 while( child < parentNode->children.count() )
00734                 {
00735                         if ( parentNode->children[child]->GetNode()->getName()  == nodeName )
00736                         {
00737                                 row = child;
00738                                 break;
00739                         }
00740                         child++;
00741                 }
00742                 if( row < 0 )   return QModelIndex();
00743                 //if(nodeName == ".") return index(row+1, 0, parentIndex );
00744                 return index(row, 0, parentIndex );
00745         }
00746         else
00747                 return QModelIndex();
00748 
00749 }
00750 
00759 QModelIndex SceneModel::IndexFromPath( const SoNodeKitPath& coinNodePath ) const
00760 {
00761         SoBaseKit* coinNode = static_cast< SoBaseKit* >( coinNodePath.getTail() );
00762         if( !coinNode ) tgf::SevereError( "IndexFromPath Null coinNode." );
00763 
00764         if( coinNode->getTypeId().getName().getString() == SbName("TLightKit") ) return index( 0, 0 );
00765 
00766         if ( coinNodePath.getLength() > 1 )
00767         {
00768                 SoBaseKit* coinParent = static_cast< SoBaseKit* >( coinNodePath.getNodeFromTail(1) );
00769                 if( !coinParent ) tgf::SevereError( "IndexFromPath Null coinParent." );
00770 
00771                 if( coinParent->getTypeId().getName() == SbName( "TLightKit") ) return index( 0, 0 );
00772 
00773                 SoNodeKitListPart* coinPartList = static_cast< SoNodeKitListPart* >( coinParent->getPart( "childList", true ) );
00774         if( !coinPartList ) tgf::SevereError( "IndexFromPath Null coinPartList." );
00775 
00776         int row = coinPartList->findChild(coinNode);
00777         if( coinParent->getTypeId().isDerivedFrom( TSeparatorKit::getClassTypeId() ) )
00778                 {
00779                 if( coinParent->getPart( "tracker", false ) &&  !coinParent->getPart( "tracker", false )->getTypeId().isDerivedFrom( TSceneTracker::getClassTypeId() ) ) row++;
00780                 }
00781         if( coinNodePath.getNodeFromTail(1)->getTypeId().isDerivedFrom( SoSceneKit::getClassTypeId() ) )
00782                 {
00783                 int child = 0;
00784                         while( child < m_instanceRoot->children.count() )
00785                         {
00786                                 if ( m_instanceRoot->children[child]->GetNode() == coinNode )
00787                                         break;
00788                                 child++;
00789                         }
00790                 return index( child, 0 );
00791                 }
00792                 else
00793                 {
00794                         SoNodeKitPath* parentPath = static_cast< SoNodeKitPath* > ( coinNodePath.copy( 0, 0 ) );
00795                         parentPath->truncate( parentPath->getLength() - 1 );
00796                                                 QModelIndex parentIndex = IndexFromPath( *parentPath );
00797                         QModelIndex childIndex =  index (row, 0, parentIndex );
00798                 return childIndex;
00799                 }
00800 
00801         }
00802         else
00803                 return QModelIndex();
00804 
00805 }
00806 
00811 bool SceneModel::Paste( tgc::PasteType type, SoBaseKit& coinParent, SoNode& coinNode, int row )
00812 {
00813         SoNode* coinChild = 0;
00814         SoNode* pCoinParent = 0;
00815         pCoinParent = &coinParent;
00816 
00817         if ( type == tgc::Shared ) coinChild = &coinNode;
00818 
00819 
00820         switch ( type )
00821         {
00822                 case tgc::Copied :
00823                         coinChild = static_cast< SoNode* >( coinNode.copy( true ) );
00824                         break;
00825 
00826                 case tgc::Shared :
00827                 default :
00828                         coinChild = &coinNode;
00829                     break;
00830         }
00831         if( !coinChild->getTypeId().isDerivedFrom( SoBaseKit::getClassTypeId() ) )
00832         {
00833                 if( coinChild->getTypeId().isDerivedFrom( TTracker::getClassTypeId() ) )
00834                 {
00835                         TSeparatorKit* separatorKit = static_cast< TSeparatorKit* >( pCoinParent );
00836                         TTracker* tracker = static_cast< TTracker* >( separatorKit->getPart( "tracker", false ) );
00837                         if (tracker)
00838                         {
00839                                 QMessageBox::warning( 0, tr( "Tonatiuh warning" ), tr( "This TSeparatorKit already contains a tracker" ) );
00840                                 return false;
00841                         }
00842                         coinParent.setPart( "tracker", coinChild );
00843 
00844                 }
00845                 if( coinChild->getTypeId().isDerivedFrom( SoShape::getClassTypeId() ) )
00846                 {
00847                         TShapeKit* shapeKit = static_cast< TShapeKit* >( pCoinParent );
00848                         if(!shapeKit)   return false;
00849                         TShape* shape = static_cast< TShape* >( shapeKit->getPart( "shape", false ) );
00850 
00851                 if (shape)
00852                 {
00853                         QMessageBox::warning( 0, tr( "Tonatiuh warning" ), tr( "This TShapeKit already contains a shape" ) );
00854                         return false;
00855                 }
00856                         coinParent.setPart("shape", coinChild );
00857                 }
00858                 if( coinChild->getTypeId().isDerivedFrom( SoMaterial::getClassTypeId() ) )
00859                 {
00860                         TShapeKit* shapeKit = static_cast< TShapeKit* >( pCoinParent );
00861                         if(!shapeKit)   return false;
00862                         TMaterial* material = static_cast< TMaterial* >( shapeKit->getPart( "material", false ) );
00863                         if (material)
00864                 {
00865                         QMessageBox::warning( 0, tr( "Tonatiuh warning" ), tr( "This TShapeKit already contains a material" ) );
00866                         return false;
00867                 }
00868                         coinParent.setPart("material", coinChild );
00869                 }
00870 
00871         }
00872         else
00873         {
00874                 SoNodeKitListPart* coinPartList = static_cast< SoNodeKitListPart* >( coinParent.getPart( "childList", true ) );
00875                 if( !coinPartList ) tgf::SevereError( "SceneModel::Paste Null coinPartList pointer" );
00876                 if( coinParent.getPart( "tracker", false ) ) coinPartList->insertChild( coinChild, row -1 );
00877                 else coinPartList->insertChild( coinChild, row );
00878         }
00879 
00880         QList<InstanceNode*>& instanceListParent = m_mapCoinQt[ &coinParent ];
00881         for ( int index = 0; index < instanceListParent.count(); ++index )
00882         {
00883             InstanceNode* instanceParent = instanceListParent[index];
00884                 InstanceNode* instanceChild = new InstanceNode( coinChild );
00885                 instanceParent->InsertChild( row, instanceChild );
00886 
00887                 //Inserting InstanceNode in the map
00888                 QList< InstanceNode* > instanceNodeList;
00889                 m_mapCoinQt.insert( std::make_pair( coinChild, instanceNodeList ) );
00890         m_mapCoinQt[ coinChild ].append( instanceChild );
00891                 GenerateInstanceTree( *instanceChild );
00892         }
00893 
00894         emit layoutChanged();
00895         return true;
00896 }
00897 
00898 
00899 bool SceneModel::SetNodeName( SoNode* coinChild, QString newName )
00900 {
00901         QList< InstanceNode* > nodeInstances = m_mapCoinQt[ coinChild ];
00902         if( nodeInstances.size() == 0 ) return false;
00903 
00904         QList< InstanceNode* > instancesParent;
00905         for( int index = 0; index < nodeInstances.size(); ++index )
00906         {
00907 
00908                 InstanceNode* instance = nodeInstances[index];
00909                 QVector< InstanceNode* > parentChildren = instance->GetParent()->children;
00910                 int childIndex = parentChildren.indexOf( instance );
00911                 for( int child = 0; child < parentChildren.size(); ++child )
00912                 {
00913 
00914                         SbName idChildName = parentChildren[child]->GetNode()->getName();
00915                         if( child!= childIndex && idChildName == newName.toStdString().c_str() )        return false;
00916                 }
00917         }
00918         coinChild->setName( newName.toStdString().c_str() );
00919 
00920 
00921         emit layoutChanged();
00922         return true;
00923 
00924 }
00925 
00926 void SceneModel::UpdateSceneModel()
00927 {
00928 
00929         TLightKit* lightKit = static_cast< TLightKit* >( m_coinScene->getPart( "lightList[0]", false ) );
00930         if ( !lightKit )        return;
00931 
00932         TSeparatorKit* concentratorRoot = static_cast< TSeparatorKit* >( m_coinScene->getPart( "childList[0]", false ) );
00933         if ( !concentratorRoot )        return;
00934 
00935         SoGetBoundingBoxAction* bbAction = new SoGetBoundingBoxAction( SbViewportRegion() ) ;
00936         concentratorRoot->getBoundingBox( bbAction );
00937 
00938         SbBox3f box = bbAction->getXfBoundingBox().project();
00939         delete bbAction;
00940 
00941         BBox sceneBox;
00942         if( !box.isEmpty() )
00943         {
00944                 sceneBox.pMin = Point3D( box.getMin()[0], box.getMin()[1], box.getMin()[2] );
00945                 sceneBox.pMax = Point3D( box.getMax()[0], box.getMax()[1], box.getMax()[2] );
00946                 if( lightKit ) lightKit->Update( sceneBox );
00947         }
00948         emit layoutChanged();
00949 
00950 }
00951 
00952 void SceneModel::DeleteInstanceTree( InstanceNode& instanceNode )
00953 {
00954         /*if( instanceNode.GetNode()->getTypeId().isDerivedFrom( TSeparatorKit::getClassTypeId() ) )
00955         {
00956                 TSeparatorKit* separatorNode = static_cast<TSeparatorKit*>( instanceNode.GetNode() );
00957                 SoNode* tracker = separatorNode->getPart( "tracker", false );
00958                 if( tracker )
00959                 {
00960                         TTracker* trackerNode = static_cast< TTracker* >( tracker );
00961                         //trackerNode->SetSceneKit( 0 );
00962                 }
00963         }*/
00964         while (instanceNode.children.count()>0)
00965         {
00966                 InstanceNode* childInstance = instanceNode.children[instanceNode.children.count()-1];
00967                 DeleteInstanceTree( *childInstance );
00968                 //delete childInstance;
00969         }
00970 
00971         QList<InstanceNode*>& instanceList = m_mapCoinQt[ instanceNode.GetNode()];
00972         instanceList.removeAt( instanceList.indexOf( &instanceNode ) );
00973 
00974         InstanceNode* instanceParent = instanceNode.GetParent();
00975         if( instanceParent )
00976         {
00977                 int row = instanceParent->children.indexOf( &instanceNode );
00978                 instanceParent->children.remove( row );
00979         }
00980 }
00981 
00982 SoNodeKitPath* SceneModel::PathFromIndex( const QModelIndex& modelIndex ) const
00983 {
00984         SoNode* coinNode = NodeFromIndex( modelIndex )->GetNode();
00985         if (!coinNode->getTypeId().isDerivedFrom( SoBaseKit::getClassTypeId() ) )
00986         {
00987 
00988         QModelIndex parentIndex = parent( modelIndex );
00989                 SoNodeKitPath* parentPath = PathFromIndex( parentIndex );
00990                 return parentPath;
00991 
00992         }
00993         else
00994         {
00995                 SoSearchAction* coinSearch = new SoSearchAction();
00996                 coinSearch->setNode( m_coinScene );
00997                 coinSearch->setInterest( SoSearchAction::FIRST);
00998                 coinSearch->apply( m_coinRoot );
00999 
01000                 SoPath* coinScenePath = coinSearch->getPath( );
01001                 if( !coinScenePath ) tgf::SevereError( "PathFromIndex Null coinScenePath." );
01002 
01003                 SoNodeKitPath* nodePath = static_cast< SoNodeKitPath* > ( coinScenePath );
01004                 if( !nodePath ) tgf::SevereError( "PathFromIndex Null nodePath." );
01005 
01006                 nodePath->ref();
01007                 delete coinSearch;
01008 
01009                 InstanceNode* instanceNode = NodeFromIndex( modelIndex );
01010 
01011                 SoNodeList nodeList;
01012                 while(instanceNode->GetParent() )
01013                 {
01014                         nodeList.append( instanceNode->GetNode() );
01015                         instanceNode = instanceNode->GetParent();
01016                 }
01017 
01018                 for( int i = nodeList.getLength(); i > 0; --i )
01019                 {
01020                         SoBaseKit* coinNode = static_cast< SoBaseKit* >( nodeList[i-1] );
01021                         if ( coinNode ) nodePath->append( coinNode );
01022 
01023                 }
01024                 return nodePath;
01025         }
01026 }
